installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# This script installs the Squad game server using Wine and SteamCMD, as well as creates a start.sh script.

# Navigate to the temporary directory and setup SteamCMD
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

# Create a directory to prevent SteamCMD disk write errors
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

# Install the game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
$( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) \
+app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -n ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] && printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) \
$( [[ -n ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] && printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate \
+quit

# Remove the Steam workshop file to prevent conflict with mods specified in the variables tab
rm /mnt/server/steamapps/workshop/appworkshop_393380.acf

# Address ownership issues which can cause SteamCMD to fail, especially when running as root
chown -R root:root /mnt

# Set the HOME environment variable to the server directory
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Download specified workshop items using a list from the `WORKSHOP_ITEMS` environment variable
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous \
$(IFS=','; for item in $WORKSHOP_ITEMS; do echo "+workshop_download_item 393380 ${item}"; done) \
+quit

# Move downloaded mods to the appropriate directory
mv -f /mnt/server/steamapps/workshop/content/393380/* /mnt/server/SquadGame/Plugins/Mods/

# Create or Download 'start.sh' in the server directory
echo "Creating config.sh script in the server directory..."
cat << 'EOF' > /mnt/server/config.sh
#!/bin/bash
FIXEDMAXTICKRATE=
QueryPort=
EOF

chmod +x /mnt/server/config.sh

# Inform user of installation completion
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation and script setup completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
